channel.title: Elemental Chat on Holochain
channel.description:
Holochain announces that Elemental Chat on Holochain RSM is working, with about 50 nodes fully peer-to-peer
[IT'S ALIIIIIIVE\!](https://blog.holochain.org/its-aliiiiiive/) - Holochain Blog
[Closing the Year with Elemental Chat on Holochain RSM](https://medium.com/h-o-l-o/closing-the-year-with-elemental-chat-on-holochain-rsm-105f9eede19c) - Medium, 2020-12-24
["RSM" refers to the new, performant, and simplified version of Holochain on Rust (sometimes called Holochain RSM for Refactored State Model) - https://github.com/holochain/holochain]

item.title: Elemental Chat on Holochain
item.dc:creator: peterkaminski
item.description:
Holochain announces that Elemental Chat on Holochain RSM is working, with about 50 nodes fully peer-to-peer

IT’S ALIIIIIIVE! - Holochain Blog

Closing the Year with Elemental Chat on Holochain RSM - Medium, 2020-12-24

[“RSM” refers to the new, performant, and simplified version of Holochain on Rust (sometimes called Holochain RSM for Refactored State Model) - https://github.com/holochain/holochain]
